metadata.title: CVE-2017-8374 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The mad_bit_skip function in bit.c in Underbit MAD libmad 0.15.1b allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-readand application crash) via a crafted audio file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8374` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmad0 - 0.15.1b-9ubuntu16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmad package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.15.1b-9ubuntu16.04.1').
